â
'''MAX''' is a [[Linux distribution]] sponsored by the department of education of the [[autonomous community]] of [[Madrid]]. MAX stands for '''MA'''drid Linu'''X'''. It is based on [[Knoppix]].{{Fact|date=February 2008}} Since 2003 MAX has been installed on all the computers of the schools in the autonomous community of Madrid. MAX supports both [[KDE]] and [[GNOME]] along with most common programs used under Linux such as [[Konqueror]], [[Mozilla Thunderbird]], [[OpenOffice.org]], [[Mozilla Firefox]] and [[Audacity]]. MAX comes as both a [[LiveCD]] and an installable system.
+
'''MAX''' is a [[Linux distribution]] sponsored by the department of education of the [[autonomous community]] of [[Madrid]]. MAX stands for '''MA'''drid Linu'''X'''. It is based on [[Knoppix]].{{Fact|date=February 2008}} Since 2003 MAX has been installed on all the computers of the schools in the autonomous community of Madrid. MAX supports both [[KDE]] and [[GNOME]] along with most common programs used under Linux such as [[Konqueror]], [[Mozilla Thunderbird]], [[OpenOffice.org]], [[Mozilla Firefox]] and [[Audacity]]. MAX comes as both a [[Live CD]] and an installable system.
